= Introduction =

This page describes how we organize test files in OSDE. The contents in this page is a general description on how to checkout and run tests. If you are a developer and would like to actually write testing codes in OSDE. Please refer to [http://code.google.com/p/opensocial-development-environment/wiki/OSDETestSpecs OSDE Test Specs] for more details and guidelines.
